definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: A very good example of this grape is Summerfield Merlot.
sentences.chinese: 金州夏野梅洛紅是一個非常好的例證。

sentences.english: I’d like to cite my own experience as an example.
sentences.chinese: 這裏我想拿自己的親身經歷作爲例證。

sentences.english: The combination of evidence and example may be the solution.
sentences.chinese: 這種例證結合的方式或許不失爲解決之道。

sentences.english: Some dictionary writer use citation to show what word mean.
sentences.chinese: 有些辭典的編纂者用引文作例證以解釋詞義。

sentences.english: Paraphrases provide sufficient information, clear directions and rich examples. It is the model of new dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 釋義準確全面，例證豐富，是新型詞典的典範。

sentences.english: To argue with them, I point out an example, which is more familiar.
sentences.chinese: 爲了反駁他們，我可以指出，人們更加熟悉的例證。

sentences.english: exemplify, as a body, the professional and humane behavior of its members;
sentences.chinese: 作爲主體，例證其成員專業且有人情味的行爲。

sentences.english: Another illustration can be seen in the common use of metals and minerals in traditional medicines.
sentences.chinese: 另一項例證是傳統藥物中金屬和礦物質的廣泛使用。

sentences.english: Apple's customer service, which is perennially ranked highly, is illustrative of the differences.
sentences.chinese: 常年排名很高的蘋果公司顧客服務是這一差異的例證。

sentences.english: However, the two provinces developed in different ways because of the government's different policies of immigrations.
sentences.chinese: 在臺灣與四川移民社會中的閩粵家族發展即是例證。

sentences.english: Stage 3' semantic translation of the whole examPle.
sentences.chinese: 以語義翻譯法翻譯整個例證。

sentences.english: Some samples of Occam's discussions may be useful.
sentences.chinese: 奧卡姆議論中的某些例證可能有些用處。

sentences.english: Moreover, in the case of the inverse calculation, it was shown that the stable and efficient convergences were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 並且由例證可見，反算的算法收斂穩定，計算效率高。

sentences.english: Her rudeness was an example of her typically bad manners.
sentences.chinese: 她的粗魯正式她態度惡劣的典型例證。

sentences.english: These are all good examples of the China-US friendly exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是中美開展友好往來的例證。

sentences.english: The usage of " Na " ecosystem culture is a good example.
sentences.chinese: “那”生態文化的運演是一個極佳的例證。

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
to cite/to quote/to cite as evidence
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
to comment/a point by point commentary
